Posts.Content: Mar 21, 2007 01:48PM sunshinegirl wrote: Had my reg mammo in nov/06, phone call couple days later, found a area of dense tissue nothing to worry about. Had a US done in dec/06 and needle core biopsy. Diagnosed as invasive lobular carcinoma right after Christmas. Had a lumpectomy in Feb/07 was 2cm, no lymph node involvement, Stage 1. Just had a re-excision today for clean margins. Will have radiation and 5 years of arimidex.
Posts.Title: How were you diagnosed? Symptoms/Signs, etc? greenacres nelia48

Posts.Content: Oct 3, 2007 06:34PM sunshinegirl wrote: I just had a ultrasound and core biopsy this morning.Â They first, gave a needle to freeze the skin and then did the core biopsy which didn't hurt a bit. The radiologist thinks its just scar tissue, but wants to make sure. I just was done with my radiation treatment in June. Mine was stage 1, so I am hoping it is just scar tissue. The ultrasound tech said the scar tissue was about 4 cm.
Posts.Title: ultrasound breast biopsy yellowrose Beesie

Posts.Content: Feb 5, 2010 06:10PM sunshinegirl wrote: Its a lot better, a little pink but a lot better than it was. I went to the doctor's yesterday and he said its looks good. I still have a couple more days on keflex. He wrote me a script for kelfex, just in case it comes back since this is the second time around with celluitis. I guess this dosen't happen too often with people who had breast cancer surgery. I read about 1% gets this complication. He said I'm his first patient to have celluitis to the bresat. Thanks for asking Kira.
Posts.Title: celluitis again sunshinegirl kira

Posts.Content: Feb 3, 2010 06:05PM sunshinegirl wrote: I had a bout with celluits on my arm about 2 years ago, a year after my breast cancer surgery. I had my celluitis again last week. This time the rash was on my breast, part of my back and upper arm. I went to m doctor who put me on keflex for 10 days, but said if it gets worse to go to emerg. But in 2 days it did get a lot better, but my breast and arm the skin is dry and peeling. The skin color is pink and blochy. Does anybody know how long does it take to clear up?
Posts.Title: celluitis again sunshinegirl kira
